verbs.description: [V: smartphones] ‘ causing mental health problems in two - year - olds’ spending hours on smartphones and tablet devices has frequently been linked to exacerbating mental wellbeing but new research claims the damage might start in users as young as two professor keith campbell san diego state university national institute of health us professor jean twenge preventive medicine health university of georgia usa today national institutes of health depression
